function.name: exa_get_contents
function.description: Fetch full web page contents from a list of URLs using Exa AI. Returns text and optional highlights from each URL.

urls.description: List of URLs to fetch contents from (1-20 URLs)

getText.description: Whether to include full text content (default: true)

getHighlights.description: Whether to include content highlights (default: false)

messages.message: I couldn't fetch the page contents right now.
